  • Constructor Details

    • GameView

      public GameView()

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init(GameViewModel gameViewModel, BackgroundImageViewModel backgroundImageViewModel, ViewHandler viewHandler)
      Init method, sets game view model instance and view handler instance. Also initializes the controller of all imported views and the bindings of all fxml elements with the game view model. Subscribes as listener to the game view model to trigger redirects.
      Parameters:
      gameViewModel - game view model instance
      backgroundImageViewModel - background image view model instance
      viewHandler - view handler instance

    • redirectToGame

      private void redirectToGame(PropertyChangeEvent event)
      Triggers a redirect to the game view when the event, this method is subscribed to, is triggered.
      Parameters:
      event - property change events

    • handleKeyPressed

      private void handleKeyPressed(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      This method is executed when a key is pressed in the game view. Triggers the character movements in the game view model.
      Parameters:
      event - key event

    • handleKeyReleased

      private void handleKeyReleased(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      This method is executed when a pressed key is released in the game view. Stops the character movements in the game model view.
      Parameters:
      event - key event

    • handleButtonLevelSuccessContinue

      private void handleButtonLevelSuccessContinue(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is triggered, when continue is clicked in the level success dialog. Triggers all needed level success continue actions in the game view model and reopens the game view.
      Parameters:
      event - action event

    • handleButtonLevelSuccessQuit

      private void handleButtonLevelSuccessQuit(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is triggered, when quit is clicked in the level success dialog. Triggers all needed level success quit actions in the game view model and redirects to the start view.
      Parameters:
      event - action event

    • handleButtonGameSuccessQuit

      private void handleButtonGameSuccessQuit(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is triggered, when confirm is clicked in the game success dialog. Saves the game and redirects to the start view.
      Parameters:
      event - action event

    • handleButtonGameOverQuit

      private void handleButtonGameOverQuit(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is triggered, when confirm is clicked in the game over dialog. Saves the game and redirects to the start view.
      Parameters:
      event - action event

    • handleButtonQuitGameContinue

      private void handleButtonQuitGameContinue(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is triggered, when continue is clicked in the pause dialog. Triggers the corresponding method in the game view model and reopens the game view.
      Parameters:
      event - action event

    • handleButtonQuitGame

      private void handleButtonQuitGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is triggered, when quit is clicked in the pause dialog. Disconnects the character and redirects to the start view.
      Parameters:
      event - action event
